name: FLASH-MD
description: An easy and simple WhatsApp bot developed by France King

PREFIX.description: Set the prefix for bot commands. You can use multiple prefixes by separating them with commas. Example: '.', '#', '!'

AUTO_READ_MESSAGES.description: Turn this 'on' if you want the bot to automatically read incoming messages. Use 'off' to disable it.

BLOCK_ALL.description: Turn this 'on' if you want the bot to automatically block ANYONE WHO SENDS YOU A MESSAGE. Use 'off' to disable it.

AUTO_VIEW_STATUS.description: Automatically view your contacts' status updates. Type 'on' to activate or 'off' to deactivate.

AUTO_SAVE_STATUS.description: Automatically download and send status updates from your contacts. Type 'yes' to enable or 'no' to disable.

PM_PERMIT.description: Restrict the bot's use in private messages. Type 'on' to allow or 'no' to block usage in private messages.

AUTO_REACTION.description: Automatically react to received messages. Set to 'on' to enable or 'off' to disable.

ANTI_DELETE.description: Prevent others from deleting their messages in a chat. Set to 'on' to enable or 'off' to disable.

TIME_ZONE.description: Specify your country's time zone (e.g., 'Africa/Nairobi'). This ensures that bot activities follow your local time.

ANTICALL.description: Automatically decline incoming calls. Type 'on' to activate or 'off' to deactivate.

BOT_MODE.description: Set the bot to 'private' mode to restrict access to certain users or 'public' mode for general access.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Insert your Heroku API key here. This allows you to manage environment variables and other settings more effectively.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Insert your Heroku app name here (should match the app name from the top).

SESSION_ID.description: Place your unique FLASH MD session ID here. This is required for the bot to function.

OWNER_NAME.description: Enter the name of the bot owner. This name will be displayed when required.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Enter your phone number without the '+' sign. Use your country code (e.g., '254' for Kenya).

WARN_COUNT.description: Set the limit for warnings issued by the bot. Once this limit is reached, action will be taken.

CHAT_BOT.description: Set to 'on' if you want the bot to respond to user messages automatically. Use 'off' to disable auto-chatting.

STARTING_MESSAGE.description: Show a starting message when the bot is activated. Set to 'on' to show or 'off' to hide.

PRESENCE.description: Choose how you want to appear to others: 'online' (always online), 'typing' (currently typing), 'recording' (currently recording audio), or leave blank for real-time presence.
